general.name: sdss_tiles
general.description: List of SDSS-I, -II tiles that were run through the tiling product, with corresponding geometrical information. This geometrical information is in mangle-type format (see the mangle documentation for a full explanation).

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

hdu0.name: PRIMARY
hdu0.description:
For IDL users, this file is in a "FITS" mangle format, readable by
the idlutils routine "read_fits_polygons".

header.comment: migration: description of keyword/column not found. Needs update

size of each
